pattern.name: Title Case
pattern.description: Is the string in "Title Case" format? In other words, are all initial letters in upper case and everything else in lower case?
pattern.example: Commonly names of peoples and addresses follow title case format (at least in countries of Greek-Latin heritage). Consequently, if a customer enters a name that does not follow this rule, the probability that it is a fake name increases.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @base , case when initcap(@nominalColumn)=@nominalColumn then 1 else 0 end AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable
